document.discussion_title: Government hopes Urjit Patel will 'rise to occasion', curb inflation
document.topic_text: Published By: The Economic Times - Today New In Last 40 minutes Government hopes Urjit Patel will 'rise to occasion', curb inflation The Economic Times (Today) - Economic Affairs Secretary Shaktikanta Das, who himself was said to be in fray for the top post at the apex bank, welcomed the appointment of Patel as the 24th RBI...
